changes.change: For Mac / Mac版
For Windows / Windows版
Fixed authentication issue
Removed unnecessary service API calls
Show a warning message when API rate limit is reached and retry after the limit period
修复帐户认证问题
移除不必要的服务接口调用
服务接口调用频率受限时显示提示信息，并在受限时段结束后自动重试
New Feature: copy saved searches
New Feature: copy tag hierarchies
Copy empty notebooks
Display reasons if any notes could not be copied
Display Yinxiang Biji customer support hyperlink for increasing upload limit temporarily
Do not copy notes if the source and target accounts are identical
新功能：复制保存的搜索
新功能：复制标签结构
复制空笔记本
显示无法复制笔记的原因
流量不足时，显示申请临时流量的印象笔记客服链接
源帐户和目标帐户相同时不能复制
Added an option to update note links after copying notes.
Cleanup YXBJ accounts which fail to sync on Android devices after using NoteDup.
Fix the issue that the copied notes cannot be synced on Android devices
新功能：完成笔记复制后自动更新笔记链接。
新功能：修复因使用之前版本NodeDup导入数据导致的Android设备无法同步帐户的问题。
修复：某些笔记复制到印象笔记帐户导致该帐户无法在Android设备上同步。
Fix the issue of account authentication
skip creating empty notebooks or tags in target account
add status information of master thread
handle the cases where network is not available
Check updates on startup
Fix a bug when notebooks/tags already exist with different letter cases
Select notebooks to copy
Select tags to copy
Chinese language support.
